reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and high-end looking, with plenty of fabric in the skirt and comfortable fit that accommodates long legs. They appreciate its quality, color, comfort, and flattering design, with one customer noting it's great for curvy body types. Opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress!
items.body: This dress is adorable, it is really nice quality for the price. It does run generous in size, so I ordered the size smaller, but very happy with the quality of the fabric. I plan on wearing it to a wedding. Read more
items.author: Cheri Brown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: Distress is very cute. It lays really well and is very very comfortable! I would recommend this dress. It is also very fancy and pretty. I purchased two of the same one. I purchased the black one and then they’re really pretty green color. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a keeper!
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! Comfortable and flattering! Fit is relaxed. I ordered my usual size and I’m happy with it. Probably going to order in another color before they sell out. Favorite dress I’ve ever ordered. Read more
items.author: Jessamyn Hawkins

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Fits true to size. The purple is a nice plum color. The look of the dress can be dowdy for a younger person but can be modernized with a nice belt and shoes. The ruffles on the bottom are flirty and gives the dress a unique look. Read more
items.author: Joy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice in black but the apricot is going back.
items.body: I got this dress in black and apricot. Really like the black on. At Amz, even tho almost everywhere else I am usually a M, I tend to need a L to fit best. However, reading the reviews, decided to stick w a M, and it fits perfectly. Will be wearing to my MILs funeral services next week, but it can have many other uses. I agree with some other reviewers that the inside slip definitely gets static. However, it's underneath and does not seem to alter the outer flow of the dress, so more just an irritation than making the dress look bad. It's a dress I'm happy to have in my closet as a go to. The apricot one (more like a winter white) just does not look good on me, tho fit is still great. Probably bc I have broad shoulders, but the bodice is not appealing where the lining starts. I was impressed that the lining was so good that you could not see through that portion to my black bra I was trying it on with, so the dresses do seem to be well made. Read more
items.author: Emily Bronte

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wishful
items.body: This was a dress purchased for my grandma as we're doing pictures with her great grandchildren. She loved the look which is why it's getting 3 stars. It's actually a lovely dress and good material. It arrived quickly too. However, it arrived today dirty as if someone wore and returned it, and then it was sold to me. So I'm returning it. I didn't have her try it on of course so I can't speak to fit. Read more
items.author: T Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs large. Get 2 size smaller
items.body: It’s a really cute and fun dress. Buying for a wedding in winter. Think color too bright. Runs large. U normally wear an XL a medium fits best. Read more
items.author: Suzie Way

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Pretty sure I was sent a used dress because the button on the neck enclosure had been ripped off. Otherwise, it seems ok. Read more
items.author: Amy Clack

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Khaki, Pink, White, Blue, Watermelon, Mint, Darkpurple, Lightblue, Apricot, Rose, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
